stack ball

Crush Stack ball blast game is free to download, chance to win rewards, fun, entertainment and save your ball from the wrong colour in rings.
You can just hold the ball fall at right stack and ball will cut the full tower in step by step. Just drop ball on the right stack in rings.

Link to the game here
  1. simply tap and hold on the screen when the ball is above a colored level.
  2. When you tap and hold the ball will dive down with enough force to shatter the levels below it.
  3. The longer you hold down the longer the ball will dive and shatter through levels.
